titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z25: Ketubah, 1917-1918.

notesStmt.note: Dimensions for the document currently unattainable.
A gold and red frame surrounds the document, and divides the page vertically. The lower half of the document's wider, left side contains the text, inscribed in fourteen narrow, horizontal panels.

Its upper half is divided into multiple sections, which display symmetrically-arranged foliate and geometric motifs in red, blue and gold; Persian seals and inscriptions further decorated this section.
The narrow panel on the document's right side contains ornate floral motifs perched on blue stems.
